item.title: JFK Assassination and Museum Tour with Lee Harvey Oswald Rooming House
item.description: Somewhere at the intersection of presidential history and American mythology, the JFK assassination continues to fascinate Dallas visitors. See the site where the infamous shooting occurred on this special historical tour to Grassy Knoll and the Kennedy Memorial; separate the facts from the theories with the help of your guide, who will walk you through that day and its aftermath. This tour includes a guide, entrance fees, and round trip transportation.

image.alt: JFK Assassination and Museum Tour with Lee Harvey Oswald Rooming House

item.title: Sightseeing Tour of Dallas
item.description: See the sights of Dallas on this small-group tour. Traveling with a guide who provides insider knowledge as you go, you'll check out attractions such as Pioneer Plaza, Dallas City Hall (designed by I.M. Pei), the Dallas Arts District, and Dealey Plaza, where JKF was shot. Plus, choose a morning or afternoon departure time to easily fit this tour into your schedule.

image.alt: Sightseeing Tour of Dallas

item.title: JFK Assassination Tour with Lee Harvey Oswald Rooming House
item.description: Immerse yourself in American history on a JFK–themed tour of Dallas, with stops at Dealey Plaza, President Kennedy’s memorial, and the location of Lee Harvey Oswald’s arrest. Your guide, who navigates for you, provides a history of JFK’s assassination and outlines the multitude of conspiracy theories that followed.

image.alt: JFK Assassination Tour with Lee Harvey Oswald Rooming House

item.title: Dallas and JFK Cruizer Tour
item.description: Opt for a more eco-friendly method of transport when sightseeing in Dallas and hop aboard an all-electric Cruizer. With just six passengers onboard, you'll have the undivided attention of your licensed guide as you zip through Downtown Dallas. See Pioneer Plaza, the Dallas Police Memorial, and John F. Kennedy Memorial Plaza along the way; admire views of Klyde Warren Park; and soak up the atmosphere in the Dallas Arts District.

image.alt: Dallas and JFK Cruizer Tour

item.title: John F. Kennedy Trolley Tour in Dallas
item.description: Hop aboard a classic trolley for a ride through downtown Dallas, following the story of one of the most pivotal moments in American history—the assassination of John F. Kennedy. Travel along the motorcade route to Dealey Plaza, the site where JFK was shot, then trace the movements of assassin Lee Harvey Oswald, from the Texas Theater to Oswald's rooming house and many other key sites.

image.alt: John F. Kennedy Trolley Tour in Dallas

item.title: Small-Group Dallas and Fort Worth City Sightseeing Tour
item.description: Expect only the best of times on this tour of two Texas cities. Get acquainted with Dallas and Forth Worth on a tour that takes you to both cities' main attractions, such as the JFK Memorial and the Cowtown Museum. This tour includes all transportation in an area that's difficult to navigate without a car.

image.alt: Small-Group Dallas and Fort Worth City Sightseeing Tour

item.title: Party Bike Pub Crawl in Deep Ellum and Downtown Dallas
item.description: Hop aboard the Party Bike for a pub crawl with a difference in Dallas. Pedal your way around Deep Ellum, stopping at three bars or pubs, where you can make the most of VIP drinks specials. BYO drinks are also welcome and the on-board sound system will keep you in the party mood as you cruise around town.

image.alt: Party Bike Pub Crawl in Deep Ellum and Downtown Dallas

item.title: Dallas Terrors Ghost Tour By US Ghost Adventures
item.description: Uncover the dark side of Dallas on this spooky after-hours walking tour. Explore downtown Dallas by night, see the infamous spot where JFK was assassinated, and dive into the city’s grim and gory history at the Dallas County Courthouse. Along the way, hear fascinating tales of haunted hotels, supernatural happenings, and real-life events.

image.alt: Dallas Terrors Ghost Tour By US Ghost Adventures

item.title: Private Dallas Party Bike Rental in Deep Ellum
item.description: A Party Bike is the ideal choice for a family celebration or a fun night out with friends, with space for up to 15 people. On this private tour, pedal around Deep Ellum and Downtown at your own pace, stopping at bars or pubs, where you can make the most of VIP drinks specials. BYO drinks are also welcome and the on-board sound system will keep you in the party mood as you cruise around town.

image.alt: Private Dallas Party Bike Rental in Deep Ellum

item.title: 1-Hour JFK Assassination Walking Tour
item.description: Learn more about one of the most notorious days in Dallas history—the assassination of President John F. Kennedy. Take in the key sites in just one hour as you drive around downtown Dallas and stop at John F. Kennedy Memorial Plaza, Dealey Plaza, and the Grassy Knoll. Along the way, enjoy a guided commentary and gain insight into the assassination, Lee Harvey Oswald, and the various conspiracy theories.

image.alt: 1-Hour JFK Assassination Walking Tour

item.title: Half-Day Best of Fort Worth Historical Tour with Transportation from Dallas
item.description: Immerse yourself in the history of Fort Worth on this half-day historical tour from Dallas. Listen to your guide detailing the history of the city's birth in the 1840s to current day while traveling with a small group of just 13 people or fewer. Plus, round-trip transportation from centrally located meeting point is included for a stress-free Fort Worth adventure.

image.alt: Half-Day Best of Fort Worth Historical Tour with Transportation from Dallas

item.title: Haunted Dallas Booze and Boos Ghost Walking Tour
item.description: See another side to Dallas on a haunted walking tour at night. With a guide, you'll explore the historical district of downtown Dallas, stopping at four bars located in old buildings, each with ghost stories or other legends. Hear about some of the city's top mysteries and creepiest haunted tales. Please note: Drinks are at your own expense.

image.alt: Haunted Dallas Booze and Boos Ghost Walking Tour

item.title: Downtown Dallas Sightseeing & History 2 Hour E-Bike tour
item.description: Discover downtown Dallas like a local on this scenic e-bike tour. Pedal your way around the sights on an easy-to-ride electric bike, and hop off to see sights such as the JFK Memorial, Dealy Plaza, Winspear Opera House, and Klyde Warren Park. Explore the Dallas Arts District, the Deep Ellum neighborhood, and the AT&T Discovery District, and learn more about Dallas’ history and heritage from your guide.

image.alt: Downtown Dallas Sightseeing & History 2 Hour E-Bike tour

item.title: Small-Group Dallas City Highlights Tour by Minivan
item.description: Get an overview of Dallas during this whirlwind small-group tour of the city's highlights. Hear live commentary from your guide as you ride in a comfortable minivan past landmarks such as the Old Red Museum, Pioneer Plaza, and Dallas City Hall. Learn more about the life and death of President John F. Kennedy as you see Dealey Plaza and the JFK Memorial. With a choice of morning or afternoon departure, and a short running time, this tour is easy to fit into your schedule.

image.alt: Small-Group Dallas City Highlights Tour by Minivan

item.title: Dallas and JFK Full-Day Tour with Sixth Floor Museum and Oswald Rooming House
item.description: Visit top Dallas highlights, as well as the Sixth Floor Museum at Dealey Plaza, on a small-group tour that explores local history, colorful neighborhoods, and the tragic story of President John F. Kennedy's assassination. Tick off a long list of highlights, then follow the paths of the Kennedys and John Harvey Oswald, the man accused of killing the president. Group size is limited to 13 people to ensure personal service, with a guide to share JFK and Dallas facts and stories throughout the day.

image.alt: Dallas and JFK Full-Day Tour with Sixth Floor Museum and Oswald Rooming House

item.title: JFK Assassination Tour with JFK Museum and Oswald's Rooming House
item.description: The assassination of President John F. Kennedy is one of the most significant moments in Dallas history. With this tour, gain insight into the fateful events as you visit Oswald's Rooming House, see the JFK memorial, and walk around Dealey Plaza. End the tour with an audio-guided independent visit to the Sixth Floor Museum (admission included).

image.alt: JFK Assassination Tour with JFK Museum and Oswald's Rooming House

item.title: Downtown Dallas Sightseeing & History 2 Hour E-Scooter tour
item.description: Discover downtown Dallas like a local on this fun e-scooter tour. Pedal your way around the sights on an easy-to-ride electric scooter, and hop off to see sights such as the Dealey Plaza, the Giant Eyeball, Dallas Farmer’s Market, and Klyde Warren Park. Learn about Dallas’ history and culture as you zip around the Dallas Arts District, Deep Ellum, and the AT&T Discovery District.

image.alt: Downtown Dallas Sightseeing & History 2 Hour E-Scooter tour

item.title: The Escape Game: Epic 60-Minute Adventures at Grapevine Mills
item.description: Take part in a fun and interactive escape game experience while in Dallas. Join forces with friends, family, or colleagues to tackle one of four immersive game experiences—Gold Rush, Prison Break, The Heist, or Playground. With just one hour to hunt for clues, decipher the puzzles, and complete your mission, you'll have to think outside of the box and work as a team if you want to win.

image.alt: The Escape Game: Epic 60-Minute Adventures at Grapevine Mills

item.title: JFK Assassination Tour with Oswald's Rooming House
item.description: The assassination of President John F. Kennedy is one of the most significant moments in Dallas history. With this tour, gain insight into the fateful events as you tour Dallas sites, including the JFK Memorial, Dealey Plaza, and the Texas theatre where Oswald was arrested. Also included is a guided visit to Oswald's Rooming House, where you can learn more about the man behind the assassination.

image.alt: JFK Assassination Tour with Oswald's Rooming House

item.title: Uptown Eats! Trolley Tour with Food Tours of America
item.description: Eat your way through the West Village and nearby spots in Dallas’ vibrant Uptown during a food and walking tour with an expert guide. Located just one mile north of downtown Dallas near the convention center, Uptown is a pedestrian-friendly area with great food options. Visit several casual eateries for tastings and a dessert, with enough food to make up a full meal. Your guide also shows you local landmarks and shares the history of this famous Texas city throughout your tour.

image.alt: Uptown Eats! Trolley Tour with Food Tours of America

item.title: Dallas' Best Tacos and Margaritas Coach Tour
item.description: Taste Dallas' best tacos and margaritas on this half-day coach tour. Learn about the history of these traditional Tex-Mex foods and beverages from your guide and sample some of the city's best tacos with stops at four local-approved eateries. Air-conditioned transport and all food and drink tastings are included.

image.alt: Dallas' Best Tacos and Margaritas Coach Tour

item.title: 2 Hour Dallas Night Sightseeing E-Scooter Tour
item.description: Exploring a new city at night can be a little overwhelming if you don’t know the area well. Avoid the stress and prebook this Dallas sightseeing small-group nighttime e-scooter tour and follow a guide through more than two of the city’s most visited districts, including the Arts District. Plus, ride an e-scooter around to each stop, which allows you to cover more ground than a walking tour can.

image.alt: 2 Hour Dallas Night Sightseeing E-Scooter Tour

item.title: Secret Food Tour of Dallas with Private Tour Option
item.description:
Howdy, y'all! On our Secret Food Tour: Dallas, you'll experience true Southern hospitality and discover why our cuisine has always been a culinary melting pot of different cultures. Our guides will lead you through the art and music-filled streets that make up the foodie paradise that is Deep Ellum and you'll sample our famous BBQ brisket, award-winning Texas chilli, buttery handmade biscuits, and lots more. And don't forget our delicious Secret Dish, which can only be described as "downright addicting!"
Our guides will lead you through the art-filled streets of Deep Ellum. As always, there's our Secret Dish, which will only be revealed on the tour!

image.alt: Secret Food Tour of Dallas with Private Tour Option

item.title: Dallas and Cowboys Stadium Combo Tour
item.description: Combine two popular Dallas tours for a day of sightseeing that covers the city and the Dallas Cowboys Stadium. The small-group tour starts with an overview of city landmarks such as Pioneer Plaza, the JFK Memorial, and the Old Red Courthouse, then continues with a guided tour of the Dallas Cowboys stadium. You'll see the press box, locker rooms, private suites, and post-game interview room, and you can step onto the field to throw a football.

image.alt: Dallas and Cowboys Stadium Combo Tour
